question: Which two countries are involved in the "Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam Dispute"?
explanation: Ethiopia and Egypt are the two countries involved in the Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam Dispute. Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam is a gravity dam located in the Blue Nile River of Ethiopia. Egypt has serious concerns about the dam construction project of Ethiopia. Egypt fears the reduction of water from the Blue Nile River and demands inspection of the said dam to allay their fears, which was rejected by Ethiopia.
